languages.text: "Так и знал{mf||а}, что ты опять будешь что-то выпрашивать... То с Райкада его спаси, теперь это".
languages.translation_comment: Играли с начала с купленным ДЛЦ, забрали Сола на корабль

languages.text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."
languages.original_text: "Так и знал{mf||а}, что ты опять будешь что-то выпрашивать... То с Райкада его спаси, теперь это".

traits.locale_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."
"I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."
"I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."
"I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."
"I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

languages.text: «Sabía que volvería para suplicar otro favor... Primero el rescate en Rykad y ahora esto».
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: «Sabía que volvería para suplicar otro favor... Primero el rescate en Rykad y ahora esto».

languages.text: “我早就知道你会再次出现在我面前，求我帮忙……先是莱卡德的救援行动，现在又来这么一出。”
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: “我早就知道你会再次出现在我面前，求我帮忙……先是莱卡德的救援行动，现在又来这么一出。”

languages.text: « Je savais que vous reviendriez quémander mon aide une fois de plus... D'abord, le sauvetage sur Rykad, et maintenant, ceci. »
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que vous reviendriez quémander mon aide une fois de plus... D'abord, le sauvetage sur Rykad, et maintenant, ceci. »

languages.text: 「君が別の恩恵を希いに戻ってくるだろうと思っていた…まず、ライカドからの救出、そして今はこれだ」
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: 「君が別の恩恵を希いに戻ってくるだろうと思っていた…まず、ライカドからの救出、そして今はこれだ」

languages.text: "Dönüp başka bir şey için daha ayaklarıma kapanacağını biliyordum. Önce Rykad'daki kurtarma meselesi, şimdi de bu."
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: "Dönüp başka bir şey için daha ayaklarıma kapanacağını biliyordum. Önce Rykad'daki kurtarma meselesi, şimdi de bu."

languages.text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet zurückkehren, um eine weitere Gnade zu erflehen ... Erst die Rettung von Rykad, jetzt das."
languages.original_text: "I knew you would be back, begging another boon... First the rescue from Rykad, now this."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet zurückkehren, um eine weitere Gnade zu erflehen ... Erst die Rettung von Rykad, jetzt das."

languages.translation_comment: Играли с начала с купленным ДЛЦ, забрали Сола на корабль
